summary.content: Full-Stack Developer passionate about building scalable SaaS platforms and contributing to open-source ecosystems. Actively maintain templates at Dokploy, run Algogist (5K+ monthly readers), and moderate r/AI_India (13K+ members). Experienced in crafting AI-powered tools, delivering production-ready solutions, and driving community-led initiatives.

items.title: MECIA Hacks (2024)
items.summary: Finalist — MECIA Hacks (2024), built AI-powered blogging solution.

items.summary: Participated in a national 24-hour hackathon solving real-world challenges using AI-powered web tools.

items.summary: Built an interactive Snapchat Lens using Snap AR Studio; explored 3D modeling and visual effects for AR content.

items.summary: Completed hands-on bootcamp covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Web3 fundamentals.

items.summary: Mastered cross-device compatible layouts using HTML and CSS.

items.name: CSS (Basic) Certificate
items.summary: It covers topics like exploring Cascading and Inheritance, exploring text styling fundamentals, understanding the use of layouts in CSS, understand the boxing of elements in CSS, among others.

items.summary: In October 2021, I completed the "What is Graphic Design?" course on LinkedIn, where I gained a comprehensive understanding of the principles and practices of graphic design.

items.summary: I Learned About Presentation Making And Visuals In The Presentation and How To Make Your PPT Mode Visual Appealing And Attractive.

items.summary: In This Course, I Learned About How Digital Marketing Works And How You Can Use Digital Marketing In Your Life.

items.name: Business Manager
items.summary: In This Course, I Learned About Business Manager And How You Manage Your Business Using Meta.

items.institution: Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Institute of Technology
items.summary:
Relevant Coursework: Blockchain, Artificial Intelligence, Web Development, Cyber Security, Wireless Communication

Highlights: Participated in MECIA Hacks (2024), Snap AR Hackathon, Web3Dev Bootcamp.

• Manage a 10K+ member AI community, curating discussions on LLMs, AI startups, and Indian AI policies.

  • Organize model release threads and maintain a community resource hub for AI developers in India.

  • Foster open collaboration between AI researchers, builders, and enthusiasts.

• Built and manage Algogist, an AI-focused tech blog covering LLMs, open-source models, AI news, and tutorials.

  • Grew the platform to 5K+ monthly readers, sharing insights on cutting-edge AI tools and developer workflows.

  • Published hands-on guides, deep dives, and prompt engineering techniques for AI enthusiasts and developers.

• Actively contribute to Dokploy’s templates repository, with 10+ merged PRs improving automation, CI/CD, and template quality.

  • Built meta.json validation tooling, added internationalized blog templates, and optimized multi-database support for Gitea and other services.

items.name: Blog Maker (sass)
items.description: Next.js, Prisma, Stripe, Radix UI, TailwindCSS, TypeScript
items.summary:
• Built a SaaS blogging platform supporting multi-user subscriptions, authentication, and secure payments.

  • Engineered a scalable backend using Next.js API routes with Prisma ORM for efficient data handling.

  • Integrated Stripe to support recurring payments and one-time purchases with real-time billing flows.

  • Optimized performance for <200ms page loads; improved accessibility using Radix UI components.

  • Deployed via Vercel with CI/CD, enabling seamless production updates.

items.name: Indian AI Tracker
items.summary:
• Developed a dashboard indexing 150+ Indian AI startups, policies, and LLM projects.

  • Implemented dynamic search, tag filters, and visualizations using Recharts and CMDK.

  • Designed a fast-loading UI using Vite and Radix UI, with dark/light theme support.

  • Achieved <1s response time and strong UX across mobile and desktop.

items.name: MemoryView AI Resources Hub
items.summary:
• Curated 150+ AI/ML learning resources for developers, researchers, and students.

  • Integrated Fuse.js for advanced fuzzy search, enabling instant content discovery.

  • Used Remix SSR for improved SEO and faster initial load times.

  • Achieved a 60% improvement in search latency and boosted session time via UI/UX enhancements.

items.name: Bhoogool - Search Engine
items.summary:
• Created a lightweight web search engine using RapidAPI to fetch real-time results.

  • Managed state using React Context API and Hooks for fast render cycles.

  • Integrated third-party APIs to improve content relevance and response accuracy.

  • Delivered sub-second search performance with a mobile-first, responsive layout.

items.name: Dokploy/templates
items.summary:
• 10+ merged PRs improving Dokploy’s official templates repository.

  • Developed a meta.json automation suite: CLI tools for deduplication, schema validation, and CI/CD validation pipelines.

  • Added and maintained 10+ production-ready templates like Habitica, Statping-NG, BookLore, Blinko, and more.

  • Impact: Improved repo maintainability and enhanced template quality used by hundreds of self-hosters.

items.name: Traceback - Movie Review Blogging
items.description: Technologies: Astro.js, Redis, TMDB API, UnoCSS, TypeScript
items.summary:
• Integrated the TMDB API with Redis caching for real-time access to movie metadata.

  • Implemented server-side rendering (SSR) and static site generation (SSG) for optimal performance and SEO.

  • Built an intuitive search system and automated OG image generation for better social media engagement.

  • Designed a clean and modern UI using UnoCSS for a seamless user experience.

items.name: Qr Code Maker
items.summary: • Built a tool for generating customizable QR codes with a user-friendly interface.

items.name: Linktree Clone
items.summary: • Recreated the Linktree interface using HTML and CSS, integrating Spotify widgets for seamless music playback directly from the webpage.

items.name: Dokploy/templates — Open Source Contributor
items.summary:
• Contributed 10+ merged pull requests to Dokploy’s official templates repo, enhancing self-hosting workflows for developers.

  • Built a robust meta.json automation suite for schema validation, versioning, and deployment consistency.

  • Integrated GitHub Actions for CI/CD testing pipelines, reducing human errors during template validation.

  • Added and maintained 10+ production-ready deployment templates (e.g., Habitica, Statping-NG, BookLore) used by hundreds of users.

  • Collaborated with maintainers to review PRs, resolve merge conflicts, and improve developer experience.
